a : article (a tia lam rîk tûr. Uar nân erawh chuan e tia lam rîk).
A-1 : (ê-wan) a tha ber, a tling ber chi.
aardvark : (ârdvârk), n. fanghmîr râl.
aaronic : (êrawnik,-al) adj. Aarona chungchâng thil. (Bible-a 'Arona' kan tih mai hi).
aaron's rod : pangpâr kuang sei chi.
aback : (abak), adv. a hnungtawlh zawngin, mak tia hnung lama eu zawk.
abacus : (abakas), n. thifang ang thil hrawl pui pui nawr tawlh theih chi nêna naupang tâna chhiarkawp belh leh paih zirna hmanrua.
abaddon : (abadan), n. chhiatna thlentu, Setana, hremhmun.
abaft : adv., prep. hnung lamah, lawng hnung lamah.
abandon : (abandan), v.t. chhuahsan, kalsan, rauhsan, thlahthlam, phatsan. v.t. inleng, intawl.
abase : (abeis), v.t. tibawlhhlawh, tihmingchhia, titlawm, tihniam. abasement, n.
abash : v.t. timualpho, tizak.
abask : adj., ni lum ai.
abate : (abeit), v.t., titâwp, tihân, tikiam, tinêp, rosum luahlân. v.i. hniam, kâm, nêp, kiam.
abatement : (abeitment) n. nêpna, kiamna, sûtna, pasaltha hming hnuh hniamna.
abatis : n. inthruai pui anga kalkawnga thing kih hnawk.
abattoir : (abatuar), n. sa talhna in.
abature : (abachiar), n. hnim hnawk hnuaia sazuk hnû.
abaxial : (abaksial), adj. zâr/tang pêl daih.
abba : n. pangchang âwa Pathian kohna (A Pa, Ka Pa).
abbacy : (abasi), n. puithiam lal thuneihna ram huam chhûng, puithiam hotu lal chhûng, puithiam lal hova puithiam rual awm hranna hmun.
abbatial : (abeshl), adj. abbot chungchâng thil.
abbe : (abê) n. puithiam.
abbess : n. sakhaw rawngbâwl tura impumpêk hmeichhe awmkhâwmho zînga a hotu ber.
abbey : (abi), n. Sakhaw rawngbâwl tura inkhung hrangte awmna hmun, chutiang kulh chu.
abbot : (abat), n. Sakhaw rawngbâwl tura inpumpêkte awmna hmuna a hotu ber (mipa).
abbreviate : (abriviet), v.t. kaih tawi, titawi.
abbreviation : n. kaihtawi.
A-B-C : (e-b-c), n. Sâp A-AW-B, thil bul, thil tanna.
abdicate : (abdikeit), v.t., v.i. bânsan, bâng, abdication n.
abdomen : (abdâwmen), n. dul, dulthuar, pum, khau leh khaukhuap dul. abdominal, adj.
abdominous : (abdawminas), adj. dul kiar.
abduct : (abdakt), v.t. mihring ru (nula, naupang, etc. ru).
abduction : n. mihring rûkna.
abductor : n. mihring rutu.
abduce : (abdius), v.t. tawlh kiang, hnûk kir.
abeam : (abîm), adv. lawng kalkhang pui zûlin.
abed : adv. khuma muin.
abele : (abîl), n. nawhalh thing, fâr kûng vâr.
aberrance : (aberans), n. kal pênna, kal kawihna.
aberant : adj. kal kawi, pelhê.
aberrate : (abereit), v.i. kal kawi, pelhê. aberration, n.
abet : v.t. sihhmuh ru, fuih ru, mitmei hmuh, a rûka remtihpui.
abetment : n. a rûka remtihpuina.
abetter : (abetar), n. fuih rutu.
abeyance : (abêans), abeyancy (-si), nn. beisei tur, hriat chian loh thil, la rêl fel hrih lohna. abeyant. adj.
abhor : (abhawr), v.t. lungten, ngei.
abhorrence : n. huatna, tenna.
abhorent : tenawm, ngeiawm, huatthlala.
abhorrer : n. hawtu, tentu.
abidance : (abaidans), n. châmna, chenchilhna.
abide : (abaid), v.i. chêng, châm, awm, khawsa, bei, bet. v.t. nghâk, tuar, dawh.
abider : n. eng emaw chhûnga luahtu.
abigail : (abigeil), n. hmeichhe tâna hmeichhe chhiahhlawh.
ability : (ability), n. theihna, tihtheihna, thiamna.
abiogenesis : (abiawjenesis), n. thil nung lo atanga thil nung a lo chawr chhuah theihna. abiogenist, n. chutiang thil ringtu chu.
abject : (abjekt), adj. paih thlâk, hnawl thlâk, rilru hniam, hmusitawm, tlawm, rethei. abjectly, adv. abjectness, n. abjection, n.
abjure : (abjiur, abjûr), vt. chhechhama phat, malmâk, lamlet. abjuration, n.
abjurer : (abjiuriar), n. chhechhama phattu. abjuratory, adj.

ablaze : (ableiz), adj. adv. kang, alh, phûr.
able : adj. thei, thiam, tling.
able bodied : adj. tha nei, tha tling. ably, adv.
ablution : (ablûshn, abliushn), n. insil faina, tui nena inthenna.

abnegation : n. phatna.
abnormal : adj. dan lo ang, mi ang lo. abnormality, n.
abnormous : (abnawrmas), adj. dan lo ang.
aboard : (abawrd), adv., prep. rêla chuang, lawnga chuang.
abode : (abawd), n. châmna hmun, chênna hmun, chambânna, v.t. v.i. hril lâwk.
abode : pa.p. of abide.
abolish : v.t. paih bo, nuai bo, bân, hnâwl. abolishment, abolition, nn.
abomasum : (abomesam), abomesus (sas) nn. sa kawchhûnga a bîng.
abominable : (abawminabl), adj. tenawm, ngeiawm, thinhrik chi, tuihnai lo.
abominate : (abawmineit) v.t. ten, thinhrik. abomination, n.
aboriginal : (abawrijinal), adj., n. awm hmasa, ram leilung luah hmasatu.
aborigines : (abawrijiniz), n. ram leilung lo luah hmasatute, lo chêng hmasate.
abort : v.t. (nau) chhiat, tlawlh, hlawhchham.
aborticide : (-said), n. nau tihtlâkna.
abortion : n. nau tihtlâkna, nau chhiatna, thla kim lova nau hrin.
abortionist : n. nau titlatu.
abortive : adj. chhiat, hlawhchham, pâmtûl.
abound : (abaund), v.i. tam le lu, hleihluak.

abrasive : adj. nâwt pilh thei.

abridgment : n. kaihtawi.

abrupt : (aprapt), adj. bung thut, âwih thut, chhumbung, bung.
abscess : (abses), n. hnai la, pân, pûn, khawihli.

absconder : n. tlân bo.
abscence : (absens), n. awm lohna, tel lohna, tlâkchhamna.
absent : adj. awm lo, tel lo, ngaihsak lo, hre chang lo. v.t. tel lo, telh loh.
absentation : n. tel lohna.
absentee : n. tel lo, awm lo.
absentism : (ism), n. tel lohna, tel lohna chin.
absenter : n. tel lo.
absentminded : adj. haihawt.
absolute : (absawliut, -lut), adj. chin nei lo, tawpkhâwk, famkim, ni chiah, fir, hlang, intodelh.
Absolute : n. Pathian.
absolution : (absawlushn, -liushn), n. thiam chantîrna, ngaihdamna, puithiam thuneihna azâra mawhphurhna laka fihlimna, kohhran hremna laka fihlimna, thiam chantîrna tawngkam.
absolutism : (-ism), n. mi pakat thu thua rorêlna.
absolute pitch : hmanraw ruai lova ri 'key' dik tak hriat reng theihna.
absolute zero : vâwt theihtâwp (a aia vâwt lehchuang awm thei tawh lo -273°C degrees).
absolve : (absawlv), v.t. fihlimtîr, thiam chantîr, ngaidam.
absorb : v.t. hîp lût, rilru zawng zawng pe, ngaihtuah mûk.
absorbable : adj. hîp lût thei.
absorbent : adj. hîp lût thei, n. thil tui hîp kang thei chi.
absorbing : adj. ngaihawm.
absorption : n. hip luhna.
absorptive : adj. hîp lût thei.
abstain : (abstein), v.i. râlbâng, laka insûm, inserh.
absteminous : (abstiminas), adj. zu laka insûm, châkna laka insûm chi.
abstention : (abstenshn), n. insûmna, ngheina.

abstergent : (abstarjent), adj. thruah fai theih. n. tihfaina.
abstinence : (abstinens), n. insûmna, ngheina.
abstinent : adj. insûm, nghei.
abstract : (abstrakt), adj. ngaihtuahna chauhva awm, rilru chauhva chêng, tak nei lo. n. kaihtawi, a tlângpui, thliar hran. v.t. la chhuak, ru chhuak, thliar hrang, kai tawi. abstraction, n.
abstractionist : n. thil fir leh thiang ber duhtu.
abstract art : n mitthlaa suangtuaha lem ziak.
abstruse : (abstrus), adj. hriatthiam har, ril.
absurb : (absard), adj. âwm lo, ang lo, ho. absurdity, absurdness, nn.

abundant : adj. tam, hluar, thahnem.

abusive : (abiusiv) adj. chaltlai taka mi ânkhum chîng, ânchhia.

act : (akt), v.i. chê, thil ti, thawk, lemchang, chang. v.t. lema chang. n. thiltih, sawrkâr thupêk, dân siam, lemchannaa bung hrang hrang. (Act of God - Mihringte dan rual lohva thil lo thleng).
acting : n. aiawh. (Acting President - President awm loh emaw theih loh emaw hlana a hmun lo luah).
actor : n. lemchang mi.
actress : n. hmeichhe lemchang mi.
action : (akshn), n. thiltih, hnathawh, chêt dâna thilti, indona hmuna inbeihna, rorêlna hmaa mi khinna.
active : (aktiv), adj. phusa, tuan tha, thahnemngai taka bei, nung tak, thatho. actively, adv. activity, n. (activiness hi chu an hmang khat deuh).
actual : (aktiual), (akchual tiin a ri lek lek zâwk a ni), adj. a tak tak, tûn lai huna awm ngei, a lem ni lo, thil kal tawh ni lo.
actualise : v.t. a tak taka chan. actuality, n. actually, adv.
actuary : (aktiuari), n. ziaktu, insurance company thil hisâptu. actuarial, (aktiuêrial), adj.
actuate : (aktiueit), v.t. tichê, tikal, tiphûr, tur (tho).
acuity : (akiuiti), n. hriamna (rilru chak lamah pawh).
acumen : (akiumen), n. rilru hriamna, rilru chak leh thûkna, thil awmze hriat tlang thiamna.
acute : (akiut), adj. hriam, zum lutuk tak, fing, fiak, natna lamah chuan, a ngaihtuahawm hun lai tak, acutely, adv. acuteness, n. 
acute accent : n. he chhinchhiahna (') hi, feet leh degree-a a minute chhinchhiahna hi (foot = 1').
adage : (adij), n. thufing.
adagio : (adâjiaw, adâwzaw), adv. muang taka hla sak.
adamant : n. lung chang ber chi, lunghlu. adamantean, adamantine, adjs. sak, luhlul, tawhkhirh, thlêm danglam theih loh. (adamantine hi chu an hmang meuh lo).
Adam's apple : n. hrawk bâwk.
adapt : v.t. miltir, siam rem, a hmeh leh remchâng zâwnga let. adaptable, adj. adaptability, adaptation, nn.
adapter : adaptor, nn. kawng danga chhawr theih nâna khâwl kelki ilo vuah hi. (Tractor motor-ah pawh thingzaina khâwl khalh vir thei tûrin adaptor an vuah a ni).
add : (ad), v.i. belh, belhchhah, sawi zawm, v.i. tipung. addition, n. additional, adj. additionally, adv.
addendum : (adendam), n. belhchhah tûr. addenda, n. addendum, pl.
adder : (adar), n. rûlngân chi, rûl hlauhawm.
addict : (adikt), v.t. â, rui, a ngawl zâwnga thil chîng dawklak, n. zûk leh hmuam leh kani lama a ngawl vei tawh or chîng dawklak tawh. addicted, adj. addiction, n.
addle : (adl), adj. buai, mumal lo, trawih, hul, ruak hiau. (Addleheaded - Rilru kim lo).
address : (adres), v.t. chu mi lama tîr, chu mi lama thawn, bia or lehkha thawn, chu mi hawi zâwnga rilru leh tha pe. n. lehkha thawna mi hming leh awmna ziak hi, hmun hming.
addresses : n. nula rimna thiltih (biaktlawn leh lehkha thawn thilah).
addressee : n. lehkha or pawisa ilo an thawna chu.
adduce : (adius), v.t. sawi chhâwng, tehkhin nana hmang. adducible, adj.
adenoid : (adenawid), n. thralbe chi khat.
adept : adj. nâl, thiam, a kawnghmang hre bel.
adequate : (adikueit, adekuit, adekuat), adj. tâwk, tâwkfâng, tam tawk. adequately, adv. adequateness, adequacy, nn.
adhere : (adhiar), v.i. bei, bet, zui, zawm.
adherence :  n. adherent, adj. n. pawm theih, pawmtu, zuitu.
adhesion : (adhîshn), n. beina, behna, inchârna.
adhesive : adj. ban, bei thei, bet thei, châr thei. n. thil ban, gawm, thil bet thei, thil châr thei.
adhesively : adv. adhesiveness, n. a beh theihna, a châr theihna.
ad hoc : (ad hawk), adj. eng emaw bîk atâna committee ilo vêl din.
adieu : (adiu), interj. chibai, dam takin, Pathian kutah ka hlân a che. n. inthlah dâwna inchibai (na).
adipose : (adipowz), adj. thau.
adjacent : (ajêsent), adj. hnai, inthenawm, inzawm, adjacency, n. adjacently, adv.
adjective : (ajektiv), n. thil nihna sawifiahtu thumal. adjectival, adj. adjectively, adjectivally, advs.
adjoin : (ajawin), v.t. and v.i. kiang awm, dawta awm, si, hne, zawm.
adjoinning : adj. insi, inhnaih.
adjourn : (ajârn), v.t. and v.i. titâwp, ni dang atâna inkhâwmna titawp, hun sawn.
adjournment : n. inkhâwmna tihtawp. (Adjournment motion - Rorêl inkhâwm tihtâwp rawtna).
adjudge : (ajaj), v.t. thu rem. (He was adjudged the best - Ani chu a berah an thlang a).
adjudicate : (ajâdikeit), v.t. rorêlna dân anga a nihna puang, v.i. inelna ilova a endiktua tang.
adjunct : (ajankt), adj. zawm, belh. n. zawm emaw, belha awm.
adjuntive : adj. zawm, inzawm, inbelhchhah. adjunctly, adjunctively, advs.
adjure : (ajûr), v.t. chhechham nên meuhva thu pe, tih tak meuhva kar or phût or puh.
adjust : (ajast), v.t. siam rem, miltîr, tuah rem. adjustable, adj. adjustment, n.
adjutant : (ajutant), n. sipai commanding officer or commandant (Manding Sâp) puitu officer, dân narânin Major aia sâng lo. Sikin Sâp.
adjutancy : n. adjutant hna.
adjutant-general : n. general pisa hotu.
admeasure : (admezhar), v.t. sem, teh, teh chhuak.
administer : v.t. rawngbâwlsak, thil sem, thil hlân or pe, sakhaw rawngbâwl. (administer oath - chhechham. administer medicine - damdawi pe). 
administration : n. inenkawlna, rolrêlna, sawrkar rorêlna, mi mal rorêl hun chhung.
administrative : adj. (administrative machine - rorêl khâwl).
administrator : n. rorêltu.
administratrix : n. rorêltunu.
admiral : n. lawng sipai hotu sâng ber. (British lawng sipai pâwlah chuan admiral of the fleet hi a sâng ber a, admiral-in a dawt a, vice-admiral leh rear-admiral in an dawt leh a ni).
admiralty : n. lawng sipai rorêltu pâwl or an pisa pui.
admire : (admâir), v.t. ngaisâng, chawisâng, zah, duh or lâwm êm êm.
admirable : (admirabl), adj. ngaihsân tlâk, chawisân phu. admirableness, n. admirably. adv.
admiration : n. ngaihsânna.
admirer : n. ngaisângtu.
admiringly : adv. ngaisâng takin or chungin.
admit : v.t., v.i. luhtîr, la lût, a dika ngai or pawm (admit defeat - hlawhchham or chak lo zâwka inngai).
admissible : adj. phal theih, pawm theih, lâk luh theih. admissibility, admittance nn. 
admission : n. lâkluhna, pawmna.
admittedly : adv. hnial buai or sawisêl ngai lovin.
admixture : (admikschar), n. a bâwlhlo, a behbâwm, thil inchawhpawlh or chawhpawlh.
admonish : v.t. zilhhau, hau.
admonition : n. hauhna, ti leh tawh lo tûra vauna.
ado : (adû), n. buaina, buaipuina, philina.
adobe : (adâwbi), n. leirawhchan ni lo, ni em khawro lei nena in sak, chutiang in chu.
adolescent : (adawlesent), adj. n. tleirâwl or râwlthar lai, tleirâwl.
adolescence : n. tleirâwl or râwlthar hun chhûng.
adopt : (adawpt), v.t. thlang, pawm, mi fa, mi thil, mi tih dân chhawm. adoption, n.
adore : (adâwr), v.t. Pathian biaka bia, ngaihlu or ngaisâng lutuk.
adorable : adj. ngaihsân mi, chawisân tlak, duhawm. adorableness, n. adorably, adv.
adoration : n. biakna, Pathian biakna, ngaihhlutna, adoringly, adv.
adorn : (adâwrn), v.t. chei, cheimawi.
adornment : n. cheimawina.
adrenal : (adrînal), adj. kal (kawchhunga mi) kianga awm.
adrift : adj. adv. thli chhêm emaw, tui len emaw avânga tuia mumal nei lova lâng mai mai, kawng zâwng nei lova tâl.
adroit : (adiâwit), adj. themthiam, kut tuan rang. adroitly, adv. adroitness, n.
adulation : (adiulêsh), n. mi biak tlawnna or fak derna. adulatory, adj.
adult : (adalt), n., adj. puitling, nutling, patling, than kin.
adulterate : (adaltereit), v.t. mi khawih chhia or tibawlhhlawh, uirê, ei tûr leh zawrhsum chi danga a hralh tlâk theih nan emaw, a tihpun nân emawa thil dukdak lo chawhpawlh. (Buhfai tihpun nana tiaulung vâr an chawhpawlh te, bâwnghnute tihtam leh tihhmêlthat nana hriak or giu an chawhpawlh te ang hi). adulterant, n. a chawhpawlh atâna lung, hriak, etc. an chelek chu. adulteration, n.
adultery : (adaltari), n. inuirenna.
adulterer : n. a uiretu.
adulteress : n. uire, mi hur.
adulterine : adj. inuire avânga thil lo awm, mi bum nâna zawrhsum dukdak lo or a lem siam.
adulterous : adj. uirena kawnga thiam lo.
adumbrate : (adambreit) v.t. chiangkuang mang lova a lemthlâ lantîr.
advalorem : adv. adj. a hlutna angin, a phu tâwkin.
advance : (advans), v.t., v.i., n., hmasâwn, hma lam pan, kaisântîr, rawt chhuak, hmasâwntir, a man dahkham, a man or hlawh pe lâwk, pawisa pûk, mi vehthlêm, mi kawmngeih tumna.
advancement : n. kai sânna.
advantage : (advantij), n. mi chaldelhna, hlêp, hlâwkna, v.t. hlêp, hlâwkpui, remchâng ûm. advantageous, adj. advantageously, adv. advantageousness, n.
advent : n. lo kal leh, lo thlen hun, Isua lo kal hmasak emaw, a lo kal leh hun tûr emaw, Krismas hma Pathianni pali inkâr hun chhûng hi.
adventist : n. thupuia Isua lo kal leh hmangtu.
adventitious : (adventishas), adj. pawn lam atanga lo lût, dân lo anga lo thleng, a palha lo thleng. (Dâktawr hian N.A.D. tia an ziak chuan "Nothing adventitious detected", "A chuap, a kawchhung, etc. -ah thil pawi danglam engmah hmuh tur a awm lo" an tihna a ni). adventitiously, adv.
adventure : (advenchar, -chiar), n. thil hlauhawm chona, thil danglam tak tawhna. (adventure stories - buaina leh harsatna chanchin chuanna thawnthu. Ramchhuah leh rammut te hi adventure a ni).
adventurer : n. thil hlauhawm cho mi, remchâng nghâk zo lova hausakna ûm mi (opportunist).
adventuress : n. hmeichhe adventurer, adventurous, adventuresome. adjs.
adversary : (advarsari), n. khingpui, hmêlma.
adverse : (advars), adj. a kalh zâwnga awm, remti lo, pawi, adversely, adv. adverseness.
adversity : nn. harsatna, buaina, lungngaihna.
advert : v.i. a lam zâwnga rilru thlêk.
advertise : (advartaiz), v.t. mipui hmaa puangzâr or târ lang, tlângaupui, sawi mawi.
advertisement : (advartizment, -tisment), n. tlângauna, sawimawina.
advertiser : (advartaizar), n. tlângau, puangzârtu.
advice : (advais), n. zilhna, finchhuahna, (Follow my advice - Ka zilhna pawm rawh).
advise : v.t. advisable, adj. remchâng, zawm or tih atana tha.
advisory : adj. zilh, finchhuah, adviser, n.
advocacy : (advawkasi), n. dilsakna, ngensakna, lama tranna.

adze : (adz), n. hachhek.
Aeolian : (iawlian), adj. thli lam thil, thli hnathawh.
aeon : eon, n. hun rei tak, chatuan.
aerate : (eareit), v.t. boruak thun. (Aerated waters - soda tui, a chhûnga carbonic acid gas an thun avânga a ûm han hawna phuan/phûl liam biah biah hi).
aerial : (aerial), adj. boruak thil, boruak or vâna awm. n. radio ngula radio zungzâm lo dawng tûra thirhrui an thlun hi.
aerie : (eri, iri, airi), n. mu-ârla bu, muvanlai bu.

aerodrome : (earawdrawm), n. thlawhna tumhmun.
aerodynamics : (earawdinamiks), n. boruak chêt vêl dân chhûtna, boruaka thlawhna ilo chêt vêl dân tur chhûtna.
aeronaut : (earawnawt), n. thlâwk mi (Rocket-a vân sânga lei hêl mite hi 'Astronaut or Cosmonaut' arsi kâr or vân sâng boruaka lêng mi, tiin an vuah).
aeronautics : n. thlawh dân hmang chhûtna.
aeroplane : (earawplein), n. thlawhtheihna.
aery : (eari), adj. boruak thil, a tak tak ni lo, suangtuahna thil.

aether : (ithar), n. See ether.
afar : adv. hla tak, hla taka awm.
affable : (afabl), adj. nêlawm, kawm nuam. affability, affableness, nn. affably, adv.

affect : (afekt), v.t. chunga thawk, khawih danglam, thinlung kuai.

affect : v.t. chang der, duh ber, ti der. affectation, n.
affection : n. ngainatna, lainatna, hmangaihna, natna chi khat.

affiance : (afâians), n. ring tâwk tia tiamna, innei tûra inhual lâwkna.

affiliate : (afiliet), v.t. fapa atâna chhawm or la lût, association or society ilova member atâna lût, pawl zawm, affiliation, n.
affinity : (afinity), n. inanna, inlaîchinna.
affirm : (afarm), v.t. dik ni ngeia sawi or chhâl, nemnghet. affirmable, adj. affirmation, n.
affirmative : n. ni, aw, dik. (He replied in the affirmative - A aw a. He replied in the negetive - A âih a, or 'Ni lo' tiin a chhang a). affirmatively, adv.
affix : (afiks), v.t. vuah, belhchhah. n. thu or tawngka bul or tawpa thu vuah belh.
afflict : (aflikt), v.t. natna, buaina or chhaih chi ai.

afraid : (afreid), adj. hlau, ngam lo. (Hei hi verb a ni lo. Mi tam takin fear (verb) aiah an hmang thin. e.g. Don't afraid).

africander : (Afrikander), nn. South Africa rama Sâp piang.

agate : (agat), n. lunghlu chi khat.

ago : (agaw), adv. hun kal liam tawhah or atangin.

ague : (êgiu), n. khawsik, tlun.
ahead : (ahed), adv. hma lamah.
ahoy : (ahawi), interj. lawng kar mite inchibaina.

aisle : (ail), n. Biak Ina thutthlêng tlar inkâra mipui kalna hmun ruak hi, Biak Ina a intepêng.
aitchbone : (eichhbawn), n. ngûm ruh, ngûm ti.
ajar : adv. inhawng, inkeu.
akin : adj. inlaichîn, inang, inzul, thuhmun.
alack : (alak), interj. Chheheu! A va pawi êm! Khai âw!
alacrity : (alakriti), n. tuan that.
alarm : (alâm, r hi a ri tel mang lo), n., v.t. râlkhêl, thil hlauhawm tlângaupuina, tihlau.
alarum : (alâram), adj., n., v.t. râlkhêl.
alas : (alâs), interj. See alack.
albeit : (awlbît), conj. a ni nachungin.
albino : (albinaw), n. mihring or ramsa a hleihluaka ngo bik hi, ni sa kham loh vanga dâng, vun vâr, sam leh mit buang.
album : (albam), n. thlalâk leh autograph zehna bu.
albumen : (albiumen), n. artui chhung vâr (a chhûngmu tuamtu hi).
alchemy : (alkimi), n. bâwlhlo chawhpawlh dân an zir tanna (An tum ber phei chu bâwlhlo chi hrang hrang a inmil tâwka chawhpawlh a, rangkachak chhuah a ni. Thil âtthlâk ni mah se, tûn laia kan ni tin hmanruaa an siam chhuah theihna chemistry science hring chhuaktu hi a ni), nunna tui hmuh chhuah tumna. alchemist (-mist), n. chutianga bâwlhlo chawk vêl thiam chu.
alcohol : (alkawhawl), n. dawi, zu fîr, chawl zang.
alcoholic : adj. noun a nih chuan, zu in mi, zu ngawl vei.
alcove : (alkawv), n. banga ker kuak, thil hûn nâna bang ker kuak, chawlhmun daihlim.
alderman : n. tualchhûng upa or hotu.
ale : (eil), n. zu chi khat.
alert : adv. harhvâng, inring, inrâlring, n. râlkhêl, alertness, n.
alfalfa : n. hnim chi khat ran chaw leh lei tihtui nâna an chelek tak.
algebra : n. a samkhai zâwnga chhiarkawp kaihtawi dân. algebraic, -al (aljebraik, -al) adj.
alias : (êlias), adv. a nih loh chuan. n, hming lem, mi bum nân emawa hming lem invuah.
alibi : (alibai), n. police or rorêlna hmaa thil tisuala an puhte'na chu thil tihsual laia hmun dang daiha awma an insawia chhuanlam an siam hi. An hmang khawlo telh telh a, tunah hi chuan chhuanlam engpawh mai atân hian an hmang ta.
alien : (êlian), n. adj. ram pâwn lam mi ram dang khua leh tui, pâwn lam thil, ze danglam.
alienate : (elieneit), v.t., sawn, hnawtchhuak, tuithlâr. alienable, adj., alienability, alienation, nn.
alight : (alait), v.i. chhuk thla, trum.
alight : adj. kâng, alh.
align : (alain), v.t. tlar. (Aligned nations - Sawrkâr tang zaho).
alignment : n. intlar, kawng laih tûr zawnna, (Non-alignment - Tualdawina).
alike : (alaik), adj. inang. adv. a angin.
aliment : (aliment), n. chakna, chaw. alimentary, adj.
alimentary canal : n. kawchhânga chaw kalna, ka atanga mawngkaw thlengin.
alimony : n. nupui then hnua rorêlnaina a phût avanga an pasal hluitena an châwm zuina pawisa pêk thin hi, nupui mâkte châwm zuina pawisa.
alive : (alaiv), adj. nung, thi lo, a thatho zâwnga nung.
alkaly : (alkali, -lai), n. bâwlhlo al lampang, alkaline (alkalin, alkalain), adj.
all : (awl), adj., adv. and n. a vai-(in).
all in all : engkima engkim.
all right : aw le, a dik vek e.
Allah : (alla), n. Muslim pathian.
alley : (alêi), v.t. tizângkhai, tinêp, chhâwk, tidam.
allege : (alej), v.t. puh.
allegation : n. puhna.

allegro : adj., adv., n. hla saka rang taka sak tûr tia chhinchhiahna.
alleluia : alleluiah (alelûia), ns., interjs. halleluiah.
allergy : (alarji), n. thil huatna, thil ngeih lohna. (Vawmbal huat te hi allergy a ni a; ke pali sa ei theih loh te pawh hi a ni). Tawng lêrah chuan thil ngei or ngaih theih lohna tih nânte hian an hmang.

alley : (ali), n. kawtthlêr zîm, pangpâr huan ilova kalkawng.
all-hail : (awl heil), interj. inchibaina tawngka. (I tân hrisêlna tinreng awm rawh se - All health to you tihna a ni).
alliance : (alains), n. tanrualna, inzawm khâwmna.
alligator : (aligeitawr), n. awle chi khat.
allocate : (alawkeit), v.t. sem, hna sem or tuk, chanpual atâna sem. allocation, n.

allow : (alau), v.t. phal, pawm, remti.

allowance : n. hun bi neia pawisa hmuh, a chuang a liam angrenga pawisa a then a zâr hmuh.

all-round : (awlraund), adj. kawng engkima thiam.
All Saints' Day : n. mi thianghlim zawng zawngte chawimawina ni, November 1.

allure : (aliur, alur), v.t. thlêm, vehthlêm, n. mi hîpna, mi bual â thei khawpa duhawmna nei. allurement, n. alluring, adj. alluringly, adv.

alluvia : pl. of alluvium, alluvial, adj.

ant : n. fanghmîr.
antasid : n. thil thûr (acid) thûrna chawk zam or nuai botu damdawi (chingal, soda, etc. ang hi).
antagonist : (antagawnist), n. kalhtu, dodâltu, hnialtu, hmêlma, khingpui, (Protoganist hi antagonist letling hlauh a ni thung - tran or puitu).
Antarctic : (antarktik), adj. Arctic (hmâr tâwp) eptu, chhim tâwp lam.
ante- : hma, hmaah (Ante-room - Pindan hmasa).
antecedent : (antisident), adj. hma lama âwn, n. hmakhalhtu.
antedate : (antideit), v.t. a ni dik tak aia hmaa tarik ziak or chhâl. (Application-te hi an ni tuk ral hnuah theh lût ta ila, lo pawmzam thei si sela, a mawi hnaiah kan thehluh ni aia hmaa a tarik kan ziah (antedate) a ngai ang).
antediluvian : (antidiluvian or -diliuvian), adv. Nova dam laia tuilêt hun aia hma, Chhura rual.
antelope : (antilâwp), n. sazuk chi khat, sathâr anna nei deuh si.
antemeridian : (antimeridian), adj. chhûnlai aia hma, chawhma lam (a.m.).
antenatal : (antinêtal), adj. pian hma thil.
antenna : (antena), n. rannung thil dapna ki or nawn hi, radio zung manna thîrhrui zam hi. (O slug, protrude thine antenna - Hnapkhawn aw, ki rawn chhuah).
antenuptial : (antinapshal), adj. inneih hma thil.
antepenult : (antipenalt), adj. thumala a ri hnuhnûng ber dawttu tu leh (Thiamthainumawngtawlh-ah hian a 'nu' lai hi a antepenult a ni ang).
anterior : (antiriawr), adj. hma lam(ah).
anthem : n. zaipâwl pahnih inchhâwna sak chi, Pathian hla, chawimawina hla.
anthology : (anthawlawji), n pangpâr or hla thu lâwr khâwm, thuziak ngaihnawm zual lâwr khâwm.
anthologist : n. thu ziak lâwr khâwmtu.
anthropo- : mihring.
anthropocentic : adj. tisa khawvêl (lei leh vân) hi mihring tân liau liau a siam a nih ringtu.
anthropoid : adj. n. mihring ang (ramsa zînga ruhrêl leh thluaka mihring hnaih ber zâwng lian chite hi anthropoid an ni).
anthropology : (anthrawpawlawji), n. mihring hnam chhuina science (zoology hi chu ramsa lampang chanchin chhuina science a ni thung). anthropological, adj.
anthropologist : n. anthropology thiam mi.
anthropomorphism : (anthrawpawmawrfizm), n. mihring pian hmang anga Pathian lantîr, mihring mize pu anga thil dang ngai. anthropomorphic, adj.
anthropophagy : (anthrawpawfaji), n. mihring sa ei.
anthropophagi : n. hringei, anthropophagous, adj.
anti- : (anti), kalh, do.
antibiotic : (antibaiawtic), adj., n. hrik chi thenkhat enlenna nên chauhva hmuh tham, hrik chi dang tisilawng or than tithu thei chi (Penicillin ang te hi natna hrik do tûra an khawi a ni a, antibiotic a ni).
antibody : (antibawdi), n. natna hrik emaw, taksa mûrin emawa mahni invên nana tuihnâng a chhuah hi.
antic : (antik), adj. n. lim or milem mak taka cheibâwl, a nuizatthlâk zâwnga zuang vêl, a mak leh ho zâwnga nunchan zir.
Antichrist : (antikraist), n. Sakawlh, dân bawhchhepa (Krista dodâltu).
anticipate : (antisipeit), v.i. lo ring lâwk, thlîr lâwk, anticipation, n.
anticlimax : (antiklaimaks), n. thu leh hla sosâng tial tiala a vâwrtâwp thleng ta lova ho taka zuzi zo leh ta hi, a vâwrtâwp thleng zo lova tlawlh.
antidote : (antidâwt), n. tûr hnathawh dodâltu damdawi, thil sual kalhtu. antidotal, adj.
antimonian : (antimâwnian), n. Chanchin Tha hian Kristiante hi dân leh hrai chunga lêng thei turin min hlâng kâng tawh tia ringtu (khurbîng pawl ngaihdân ang hian).
antipathy : (antipathi), n. huatna ril tak, inaihalna.
antipodes : (antipawdiz), n. mahni zâwn lei lehlama mi. Lei hi kan hnuai zâwn siahah verh tlang ta ila, kan awmna leh a tlangna lai chiah chu. Thil inralkah or inang lo lutuk. antipodal, adj.
antipyretic : (antipairetik), adj. khawsik damdawi.
antiquary : (antikuari), n. thil hlui chîk mi or khawn khâwm mi. antiquarian (antikuerian), adj.
antique : (antik), adj. hlui, upa, n. hmasâng thil, hmanlai mi thawmhnaw khawn khâwm. antiquiness, antiquity, nn.
antirrhinum : (antirainam), n. Sâp pangpâr chi khat, buk taka par tana a lera zuih ral.
anti-semite : (antisemait, -semait), n. Juda hnam hua or engto mi. anti-semitic, (-simitik), adj.
anti-semitism : n. Judo hnam huatna.
antiseptic : adj. pân pûn hrik laka pân leh hliam vênna damdawi. (iodine, dettol leh finel ang hi).
antisocial : (antisâwshal), adj. vântlâng kalh mi, mipui hmakhaw ngai lo mi, vântlâng tana hnawksak.
antithesis : (antithisis), n. a kalh zâwnga khaikhinna, kalhna.
antitoxin : (antitawksin), n. kawchhûnga natna hrik tuihnâng hlauhawm lo dodâltu (Ar sa thing ei sual kan tih te hi ei hmain chhuang lum mah ila, a chhûnga natna hrik chi khat staphylococci lo pung tawh khân tuihnâng hlauhawm deuh mai a lo chhuah hman tawh a, amah thi mahse, a ruang hlauhawm chu a bo chuang lo. Antitoxin hian chu mi tûr hlauhawm chu a seh da thin a ni).
antler : n. sazuk ki (hreu).
antonym : (antâwnim), n. thu awmze inkalh, a letling (Upa antonym chu naupang a ni. Hniam antonym chu sâng).
anus : (ênas), mawngkua.
anvil : n. thirdêngte dolung hi.
anxious : (angshas), adj. beisei titih, hlauthâwng titih sia rilru buai, ngaih tha fahran lo, châk, thlahlel, anxiety (angzai-iti), n. anxiously, adv. anxiousness, n.
any : adj. engpawh, a enga pawh.
anybody : n. tu pawh.
anyhow : adv. engti zâwng pawhin, engemawti mai maiin.
anyone : n. tu pawh.
anything : n. eng pawh mai.
anyway : adv. engti zâwng pawhin.
anywhere : adv. khawiah pawh.
at any rate : eng pawh ni se.
aorta : (eawrta), n. lung hnûna thisen dâwt pui.
apace : (apeis), adv. rang takin.
Apache : (apâche), n. Red Indian hnam khat. apash tia lam rîk a nih chuan mi butut, mi rura.
apart : adv. a hrangin.
apartment : n. pindan.
apathy : (apathi), n. ngaihsak lohna, khawngaihna neih lohna, thinglunga vei neih lohna. apathetic, adj. apathetically, adv.
ape : (eip), n. zâwng lian chi, zâwng anga mi tih dân zir. v.t. tlin lo chunga mi ropui zâwkte tih dân entawn.
aperient : (apîrient), adj. inkeu or kau, inhawng, kaw thuah thei chi, n. kawthuahna.
aperitif : n. chaw ei tituitu.
aperture : (apartiar, apachar), n. kua, âwng.
apex : (êpeks), n. a sâng lai ber, achhîp (zum), a vâwrtâwp.
aphasia : (afeizia), n. natna vâng emaw, rilru buai vâng emawa tawng theih loh.
aphis : (êfis, afis), n. thlai hrik (pangang, kutdurh, etc.). aphid an ti bawk. aphides, pl.
aphorism : (afawrizm), n. thufing tawi. aphoristic, adj.
apiary : (êpiari), n. khuai khawina hmun.
apiarist : n. khuai khawitu.
apices : (apisîz, êpisîe), pl. of apex.
apiculture : (epikaltiar, epikalchar), n. khuai khawi, khuai khawi dân.
apiece : (apîs), adv. pakhat zêlin, pakhat zêl atân.
aplomb : (aplawng, aplow tiin a ri lek lek zâwk a ni). n. ding char, ngêng.
apocalypse : (apawkalips), n. Thuthlung Thara Thupuan, thu puan rêng rêng. apocalyptic, adj.
apocope : (apawkawpe, apawkawpi), n. thu mala a hawrawp hnuhnûng ber paih (Poetry-ah an hmang bîk. The eternal aiah Th' eternal. In the night aiah I' the night).
apocrypha : (apawkrifa), n. sakhaw bua a ziaktu hriat chuan chiah ngam loh (Thuthlung Hluia kohhran thenkhat ina bu 14 an hnâwl tâk ang kha). 
apocryphal : adj. rinhlelh kai.
apogee : (apawji), n. arsi inhlat lai ber (Lei hêl tura rocket kah chhuahte pawh hi an sân lai ber chu apogee a ni a, an hniam (lei an hnaih) lai ber chu perigee a ni thung).
apologetic : apologetical, adjs. inchhîr, pawiti.
apologetics : n. chhanna, thlavang-hauhna. Kristianna hi a dik tia tanfung siamna.
apologue : (apawlawg), n. thufing (Esopa thawnthu ang hi).
apology : (apawlawji) n. thlavâng hauhna, inchhîrna, ngaihdam dilna.
apologise : v.i. ngaihdam dîl.
apologist : n. tantu, thlavâng hauhtu.
apophthegm : apothegm (apawthem), n. thufing tawi ber pâwl (e.g. Lal ngai lo lal a nâ...).
apoplexy : (apawpleksi), n. thluaka thisen kal buai emaw vânga tlûk thut (Tawnghmangah chuan rilru buai, â). apoplectic, -al, adjs.
apostacy : n. kohhran or mahni pawl rêng rêng phatsan or chhuahsana mi pâwla inlehna.
apostate : n. pâwl danga uire, mahni thurin phatsantu.
apostle : (apawsl), n. Gospel theh darh tura ruat, Tirhkoh, eng pâwl pawha a khaipa or zuitu rinawm.
apostleship : n. apostle hna or nihna. apostolic, adj.
apostrophe : (apawstrawfi), n. he chhinchhiahna (') hi, mi biak laklawh laia mi dang biak thut.
apothecary : n. damdawi zuar (hmânlai tawnghmang a ni).
apotheosis : (apawtheawsis), n. pathiana siam or bia, mihring emaw, thurin emaw chawi vul.
appal : (apawl), v.t. tithlabâr, titim sung sung.
appalling : adj. rapthlâk, hmuh hrehawm khawpa tuitang lo.
apparatus : (aperatas, aparatas), n. hmanrua.
apparel : n. silhfên.
apparent : (apêrent, aparent), adj. hmuh theih, a lan dân ringawtah chuan.
apparition : (aparishn), n. thil inlâr, thlarau.
appeal : (apil), v.i. ngên, tanchhan, mit la, rorêlna sâng zawka thubuai chhawm.
appear : v.i. lang, chanchinbu or lehkhabua chuang. appearance, n.
appease : (apîz), v.t. tilungawi, tlawn lungawi. appeasement, n.
appellant : n. hming, nihna hming.
append : v.t. khai, bât, belh.
appendage : n. a belhchhah.
appendicitis : (appendaisitis), n. rilphîr nâ.
appendix : n. thil khai or thil belhchhah, lehkhabu tâwp lama thu belh.
appertain : (apartein), v.i. inkaihhnawih, kâwk, intuh.
appetite : (apetait), n. tisa châkna, chaw chakna, riltâm.
appetise : v.t. tiriltâm.
appetiser : n. mi tiriltâm, chaw ei tituitu. (tawng lêrah chuan zû hi appetiser an ti thin).
applaud : (aplawd), v.t. kut bênga fak or chawimawi, thâwm neia fak. applause, n. applausive, adj.
apply : (aplai), v.t., v.i. hnawih, chuktuah, chunga tla, kâwk, dîl, ngên.
appliance : n. hmanrua.
applicable : adj. vuah theih, inhnamhnawih theih. applicably, adv.
applicant : n. dîltu.
application : n. dîlna, hnathawh lama thahnemngaihna.
appoint : (apawint), v.t. ruat, hna pe.
appointment : n. hun nei tûra intiamna, hna.
apportion : (apâwrshn), v.t. bithliah neia sem chhuak.
apposite : (apawzit), adj. rem, remchâng, âwm. appositely. adv.appositeness.
apposition : nn. belhchhah, inchuktuah.
appraise : (apreiz), v.t.man bi thliah, a hlut dân rêl, thil awmdan en thlithlai. appraisal, appraisement, nn.
appreciate : (aprîsieit), v.t. a hlutdân hrethiam, tha ti, a man ti pung. v.t. man pung.
appreciable : adj. hîsap theih, hriat thiam theih. appreciably, adv.
appreciation : n. ngaihhlutna, thil hlut dân chhûtna, thil man punna. appreciative. adj.
apprehend : (aprihend, aprehend), v.t. man, hre thiam, hlau. apprehensible. adj. apprehention. n.
apprehensive : adj. hrethiam, hlau, dâwih, hlâuthawng.
apprentice : (apentis), n. hna zirtîr, tharlâm, zir tûra inpe. v.t. apprenticeship, n, zirna, zir tûra inpêkna.
apprise: (apraiz), v.t. hriattîr, hrilh.
approach : (aprâwch), v.t., v.i. pan, hnaih, tluk teuh, mi va bia. n. hnaihna, panna kawng, kalkawng, mi va biakna, approachable. adj.
approbation : (aprawbeishn), n. remtihna, phalna. sent on approbation, an lei duh nge duhlo tia endik hmasak atâna mi hnêna zawrhsum thawn.
appropiate : (aprawprieit), v.t. manhi tâna zuah or hmang, engemaw bîk atâna zuah or ruat. (aprawpriat) adj. rem, mil, âwm.
appropriately : adv. appropriateness, appropriation, nn. engemaw bîk atâna sawrkâr pawisa ruat.
approve : (aprûv), v.t., v.i. entir, remti, pawm, fak. approval, n.
approximate : (aprawksimeit), adj. vêl, tluk teuh. v.t., v.i. hnaih. approximately, adv. approximation, n.
appurtenance : (apartenans), n. thildang a bet, thildang nêna inkûngkaih. appurtenant, adj.
apricot : (aprikawt), theite chikhat.
a priori : (e praiâwrai), a chhan atanga chhui in (Latin tawng a ni).
apron : (epron, epran tiin a ri lek lek a ni), n. kawr balh vên nâna hma lama puan awrh hi.
apropos : (aprawpâw), adv. zûl takin, rem takin, chumi kâwk or chumi azârah chuan. adj. chumi lam hawi chuan, a hun remchâng (French tawng a ni).
apt : adj. ni duh, âwn, thlêk, remchâng, âwm, thiam, rilru chak (apt pupil - zirlai thiam thei).
aptitude : (aptitiud), n. remchânna, milna, inpeihna, tlinna, rilru thlêkna lam.
apterous : (aptaras), adj. thla nei lo.
aquamarine : (akuamarîn), adj. tuipui tui atanga mihring dumpâwl nghulh.
aquarium : (akueriam), n. ennawm atâna sangha chi hrang hrang an khawina tuikhuah or tuizêm (darthlalanga siam te an ni).
aquatic : (akuatik), adj. tui lam thil, tuia chêng chi.
aquatics : n. tui lama infiamna.
aqueduct : (akuedakt), n. tui kawng (siam chawp).
aqueous : (akueas ), adj. tui ang, tuirîl, tui len khâwm.
aquiline : (akuilain, -lin), adj. muvanlai thil, muvanlai ang, muvanlai hmui anga kawm.
Arab : (arab), n. Palestina chheh vêla hnam chikhat. Arabian (arêbian), adj.
arable : (arabl), adj. leilet or thlawhhma atâna tlâk leilung.
arbiter : (arbitar), n. thu lai vawtu, thubuai remtu, rorêltu, endiktu. arbitrament.
arbitrement : nn. endiktu thu rêl. arbitration, n. arbitrator, n. arbiter nen thuhmun.
arbitrary : (arbitrari), adj. dân mumal nei lo, mi dang râwn lova thil thi, mahni thua lum, mumal lo.
arbor : n. thing, thing tlâwn.
arboreal : (arbawrial), adj. thinga chêng, thing ang. arborescent, adj. abrorescence, n.
arbour : (arbawr), n. hnim tona tual, huan, thingbuk hnuaia kawng, huana thutna daihlim.
arc : (ark), n. thil kual, bial pangkhing, electric têk êng.
arcade : (arkeid), n. kalkawng a chunga kaihkulh zar awm.
Arcadian : (arkedian), adj. thingtlâng, mâwl, tlâwm.
arcanum : (arkênam), n. thurûk, mak leh hriatthiam har.
arch : (archh), n. kaihkulh. v.t. kaihkulha sa, tikûl. adj. fing vervêk. Prefix a nih chuan a ber Arch-enemy -  Hmêlma lian ber).

archaeology : (arkeawlawji), n. hmasâng chanchin zirna. archaeological, adj.
archaelogist : hmasâng thil zir mi.
archaic : archaical (arkeik, -al), adjs. thil hlui, hmasâng thil.
archangel : (ark-einjel), n. angel chi sâng ber.
archbishop : (archbishawp), n. bishop zînga a hotu.
archdeacon : (archdîkawn), n. pastor or puithiam sâng pâwl (bishop dawttu).
archdiocese : (archdaiawsîz), n. bishop bial (puithiam or pastor satliah bial aia zau).

archer : n. thal kâp thiam.
archery : n. thal kah thiamna.

arsenic : (arsenik, arsnik), n. thîr chi khat, oxygen nêna chawhpawlha tûr hlauhawm tak ni thei. arsenic, arsenical, arsenious, adjs.
arson : n. kângmei chhuahna, mi in leh lo hâlna, chutiang thil sual tih chu.
art : hmânlai tawnghmanga nangmah (are) tihna. art, n. themthiamna sâng (zirna lam, hla mawi, lem ziak, etc. ilovah).
artful : adj. fing, fing vervâk. artfully, adv.
artless : adj. mâwl, thiam lo.
artery : n. lung atanga thisen chhuahna thazâm (Lung lam pana a kalna thazâm 'vein' hi chu a duk bik), lamlian.
artesian : (artîzhn), adj. tuikhuah lam thil, tui insiak chhuah theihna.
arthritis : (arthraitis), n. ruh chuktuah nâ, ruhseh chi khat.
artichoke : (artichawk), n. thlai chi khat sawhthing pâr anga zîk nei.
article : (artikl), n. thil tênau, thil, thu châng, thu ziak.
articular : adj. ruh chuktuah lam thil.

celluloid : n. hlo puak thei leh camphor inchawpawlha an siam thlalakna film ang chi.
cellar : (selar), n. inhnuai pindan (lei chhunga ker).
cello : (chelow), 'cello, n. violoncello kaihtawi. 'cellist, violoncelist kaih tawi.

cenotaph : (senawtaf), n. mitthi hmun danga daiha phum hriatrengna lungphun.
censer : (sensir), n. thil rimtui halna berhbu.
censor : (sensawr), n. a duh lai lai paih thei tura thu ziak ilo endiktu, fet taka sawiseltu, v.t. thuziak endik, mi thuziaka duh loh lai paih sak. censorial, adj.

census : (sensas), n. rama cheng zat mihring chhiarna.
cent : (sent), n. pawisa tlang dollar zaa then hmun khat.
centaur : (sentawr), n. hmasang Grik thawnthua sakawlh a taksa chanve chi mihring, a chanve chu sakawr.
centenary : (sentinari), n. za, kum za, kum za champhaphak. adj. za khat thil, centenarian, n. kum zaa upa.
centennial : (sentenial), adj. kum za thil.
centesimal : adj. zaa thena hmun khat.
centigrade : (sentigreid), adj. lum leh vawt tehnaa namber zaa then sawm. (Centigrade degree o chu vura tui a khangna lai, degree 100 chu tui a so hun).
centigram : centigramme, n. gram(me) zaa thena hmun khat, centilitre, n. litre zaa thena hmun khat.
centime : (sawntim), n. hmun zaa thena hmun khat.
centimetre : n. metre khat hmun zaa thena hmun khat.
centipede : (sentipid), n. ke za nei, tit.
cento : (sento), n, mi ziak sa lawr khawma mahni phuahchawp anga thu ziak.
centre : center (sentar), n. a lai tak, biala a lai tak, politics lama a tuilairap pawl. v.t. a laia dah, a laia awmtir, v.i. hual vel, awn.
centralisation : n. sawrkar rorelnaa thuneihna tam zawk a laipuia awmtir, hmun khata thuneihna bawk khawm.
centrifugal : (sentrifugal), adj. a lai atanga then chhuah tum. (Hruia lungtum hlin te hi han vaivir ila, han thlah thut ila, a centrifugal force (tha) chuan a virna lai kan kut ata kha a thlawh chhuak daih mai ang).
centripetal : adj. a lai lam awn or thlek.
centuple : (sentiupl), adj. a let za.
century : (sentiuri), n. kum za (bi), Rom sipai za khat rual, za bi.
centurion : n. century sipai hotu.
cephalic : (sefalik), adj. lu lam thil, cephalous, adj. lu nei.
ceramic : (seramik), adj. bel vuak lam thil.
ceramics : n. bel vuak.
certain : (sartin, a kum), adj. ni chiah, ngei ngei, ring chiah, loh theih loh, hnial rual loh, thenkhat, pakhat.
certainly : adv. certainty, n. rinhlelh loh thil, loh theih loh thil, dika nemnghehna.
certitude : n. rinhlelh lohna.
certificate : n. thil dik tak chhalna, lehkha, nungchang sawina lehkha, v.t. certificate pe.

(Tum khat chu khaw hrang khaw lia kan chhungte pwm darh kum tam inhmu khawm tawh lo chu inhrilh lawkna awm miah si lovin in puiah kan han inhmu khawm thut mai a; chu chu coincidence mak tak a ni). coindicent, coindedentally, adjs.

cold : (kawld), adj. awt, phur lo, nelawm lo, ngaihsakna nei lo, inkiltawih, tawng duh lo, n. vawhna, tangthawm, hritlang. cold-blooded, adj. taksa leh thisen lumna nei lo (sangha, chungu, etc.), khawngaihna tlachham, nunrawng, nunchhia, catch cold, hritlang (kai), cold feet, beisei bo, hlauhna, cold storage, vur bawma ei tur dah that. cold war, indo lo chauh chauhva ram leh ram inerna. to give the cold shoulder, ngaihsak lo, na taka chhang. in cold blood, thinur thut vang pawh ni lova lo tum lawk ve reng vanga tih. leave one cold, hmin lo, hneh lo. throw cold water on, sawi bawrhban sak. sawi hnawm sak.

counter : (kauntar), adv. a lehlamah, ani lo lamah, a kalh zawngin, n. a letling. counteract, v.t. kalh, chawk zam, nuai bo. counter attack, adj. nawr let, do let. counterbalance, n. inbuk rualna. countercharge, n. puh letna, counter-clockwise. adv. sana ban her dan kalh zawnga vir or inher. counter-foil, n. pawisa petu kawl that atana pawisa dawnna lehkha pawh thlak theih chia an siam. (Ennawm enna tiket lei hian a chhumbung an pawh thlaka a leitu an peka hi a counter-foil a ni). counter-march, v.i. a kal thelh zawnga sipai lam lai inher kir (Inchawhpawlh nuai anga khuangpui leh bazapuho an her kir ang hi ani). counterpart, n. anpui, milpui. countersign, n. mi hming ziak bula a nemnghehpuina hming ziak. counter (kauntar), v.t. kalh, do, cho let. n. tukverha thil pek chhuahna dawhkan.

credence : (kridens), n. rinna, rin awmna, credential (kridanshl), n. rinawmna petu, rinawm kaitirtu. (Mi rama palai tirhte hian palai dik tak an ni tih nemnghehna lehkha (credential) an keng thin. credible, adj. rin tlak, awih theih. credit, n. rinna, ngaihsanna, hming thatna, inrinna avanga a baa leitirna, pawisa hisapa sum lut lam ziah luhna, v.t. ring, rinna avanga leitir or hawhtir, mawh phurtua puh, creditable, adj. rin tlak, fakawm, creditor, leibatna. credo. (kridow, Latin tawng chuan kredow), n. Apostol-te thurin, credulity, n. thil awih samna, credulous, adj. awih awlsam, i-he lova awih thei, chhut lova ring thei mai.
creed : (krid), n. thurin, sakhaw lama thurin, rinna nghahchhanna.
creek : (krik), n. khawmual chhunga tuipui peng tengsawl lut.

crescendo : (khreshendow), adj. hla saka ring tial tial, n. zai rin tial tial.
cresent : (kresent), n. lian tual tual, thla de chho lam anga ki van, thla chawhma lam sepui ki tia. Turkey hnam chhinchhiahna, Mosolman sakhaw chhinchhiahna (thla thla ang). Mosolman sakhaw rinna.
cress : (kres), n. thlai chi khat antam lam chi deuh.
crest : (krest), n. sava thlikthlidir, ar leh sava chhuang or owg, thil chhop sang lai, tlang chhip or tlang dung (a sahmul then lai). inchung chhip, tlung, sakawr tuang, thir lukhum chunga a cheimawina ar hmul leh thil dang buk, tuifawn pawng lai, v.t. hneh, chuan.

disquiet : (diskuaiet), n. inrem lohna, buaina, philina, ngaihngam lohna,. v.t. chawk buai, tiphawklek. disquietude, n.
disregard : (disrigard), v.t. pawisa lo, ngaihsak lo. n. pawisak lohna, ngaihthahna.
disrepute : (disripiut), n. hming hliauna.
disrespect : (disrispekt), n. zahpah lohna, chet dan chaltlai.

dissemble : (disembl), v.t. thup, hmaithinghawng vuah.

dissent : (disent), v.i. lungrual lo, inmil lo, ngaihdan inkalh. n. helna, lungrual lohna, tlem zawkte vuina. dissension, n. ngaihdan inkalhna, inthurual lohna, intihbuaina.

dissident : (disident), n. adj. kalhtu, kalh, mil lo. dissidence, n. inrem lohna.
dissipate : (disipeit), v.t.,v.i. titlaran, theh or paih darh, khawhral. dissipated, adj. tlaran, zu seh, zu ei chhiat. dissipation, n. tisa nawmsipna kawnga intlak ralna, chhuanmang rorel, thil theh darhna.

do : thuihruaite, does (daz), doeth, doth (dath tia lam rik tur, Hman lai tawnghmang leh tunlai huna sakhaw lam tawng hman a ni a, does aiah an hmang thin. He doeth unto others...) doest, dost (dast) Mi pakhat biak nana hman a ni a, do aiah an hmang thin. Hmanlai leh sakhaw lam tawnghmang ani. electro : (ilektrow, eliktrow), thu mal hmaa vuah a nih chuan electric lam sawina.

elegy : (eliji), n. sunna hla, hla urhsun.
element : (eliment), n. thil bul, a hmahruai, thil reng renga a pawimawh lai pakhat, leilunga thil pawimawh ber ber pali (mei, tui, lei leh boruak) zinga pakhat. elements, n. p.l. zir tanna, sakrament-a chhang leh uain, leilung siamna bawlhlo bulpui (Lei leh vana thil awm zawng zawng hi element chi 92-a siam niin an hre thin a. Tunah zawngin a dang pawh an hmuh belh ta zel a. Atom an chhut keh theih atang hi chuan mihring siam chawp element thar pawh a awm ta zeuh zeuh a ni). sik leh sa, khua (ni leh thli leh ruah). (The elements were incclement - Khuain zah a ngai lo).

entrust : (entrast), v.t. rinawm taka kawltir, ring taka hlan, thu chhiah.
entry : (entri), n. luhna, ziah luh.

enunciation : n. lam rik dan, chiang taka sawina, rawtna.
envenom : v.t. tur tat, thin tiur, tur hnawih, rilru chhia puttir.
environ : (envairawn), v.t. hual.
environment : n. chhehvel, chawrna hmun, chettlatna hmuna than dan khawih danglam thei (He would be good in a better environment - Seilenna hmun tha zawkah chuan mi thain a seilian ngei ang).

epic : (epik) adj. n. ropui lai thil, hla nena vanglai hrilhna.
epicentre : (episentar), n. lirnghing nghinna lai zawn lei chung.

epitaph : (epitaf), n. thlan lunga thu ziak.

epoch : (ipawk, epawk), n. khawvel chanchina hun pawimawh lai (Thlanrawkpa Khuangchawi, Tualte Vanglai, etc. ) hun khat.
epoch-making : adj. hun khawih danglam thei khawpa pawimawh (Arsi Tlak, Mautam, etc.).

equanimity : (ikhuanimiti), n. rilru fimna, helhhawlh lohna.

idea : (aidia), n. mitthla, suangtuahna, hriatna, ngaihtuahna. ideal, adj., n. duhthusam, rilru chauhva awm. idealise, v.t. a bera ngai. idealism, n. khawvel thil bul chhutna kawnga rilru mita kan hmuh bakah leilung mita kan hmuh bakah leilung thil reng reng hian takna dang engmah an nei lo tih rinna, khawvel hi mitthla mai ani tih rinna, a tha ber duhna, idealist, n. a tha ber duhtu, khawvel hi mitthla mai a ni tih ringtu, thil theih loh beiseitu.
